headline: Dave Ramsey Reveals The Business That's Most Likely To Make You Go Broke
summary: Some business ideas are better than others due to their growth prospects, profit margins, and startup costs. However, there's one business most people should avoid, especially if they don't want to go broke. Financial personality Dave Ramsey recently revealed the one type of business that gives you the highest chance of going broke. headline: 'I Can't Imagine Not Having A Cleaner' The Middle Class Debates If A House Cleaner Is A Luxury Or A Necessity
summary: Is a house cleaner a necessary expense that saves couples a lot of time, or is it something middle class households can easily live without? This debate made its way into the Middle Class Finance subreddit, and it generated hundreds of comments. headline: A Fresh Look at Joby Aviation (JOBY) Valuation as Uber Partnership and Blade Deal Accelerate Urban Air Mobility
summary: Joby Aviation (JOBY) just grabbed the spotlight with a pair of fast-moving headlines: the strategic acquisition of Blade’s passenger business and a new partnership with Uber Technologies. Soon, urban travelers in cities like New York could book helicopter and seaplane rides through the Uber app, signaling Joby’s intent to rapidly scale access to urban air mobility. This news is not just about smoother city hops; it is a clear move toward making air taxis mainstream and gives investors a...

headline: Evaluating Uber Stock After DOJ Disability Lawsuit and Recent Surge in 2025
summary: Thinking about what to do with your Uber Technologies shares, or whether now might be a moment to wade in? You’re not alone. Uber has become one of the most talked-about names in the market, and with good reason. The stock has surged a stunning 51.8% year-to-date and an eye-popping 200.3% over the past three years, rewarding long-term shareholders handsomely. headline: Slain Trump Ally Charlie Kirk Was A Vocal Crypto Enthusiast And Investor, Labeled Bitcoin As Having More 'Integrity' Than Dollar
summary: The assassination of conservative political activist Charlie Kirk has sent shockwaves across the country, prompting universal condemnation and a federal investigation. An influential ally of President Donald Trump, the Turning Point USA founder was noted for his strong advocacy of cryptocurrency, among other causes.
